originalText.text:
I rarely feel the need to reviewing anything let alone doctors, but I simply must in the case of Dr. Arnouk. This was the easiest, most seamless, and positive doctor’s experience that I’ve ever had. It felt like I was with a long time friend with how cared for I was. He made sure I understood what was going on and guided me through it all. Best doctor’s visit ever!

Not to mention all of the receptionists were so kind and helpful too!

originalText.text:
Great on all fronts.  Dr. Arnouk is very good at his work and listens, asks the right questions, and comes up with solutions.  He talks to me about available options and helps me find the right course to recovery.

The office staff is wonderful and helpful and it’s always easy to get an appointment.  I’ve referred several people to Dr. Arnouk.

originalText.text: I’ve had for a few years problems with my shoulder and rotation. Dr. Arnouk was able to ease my fears in regards to cortisone shoots. I followed up with PT and I have noticed much improvement. My appointments have been on time and the staff is great.

originalText.text: Dr. Arnok is the best. Very attentive the patients needs and very knowledgeable. He always make me feel comfortable to totally share my medical issues with him.

text.text: Dr. Arnok is the best. Very attentive the patients needs and very knowledgeable. He always make me feel comfortable to totally share my medical issues with him.

originalText.text: I’m extremely satisfied with Dr. Jonny Arnouk, it was my first time scheduling an appointment with him, my experience was great the minute I arrived for my appointment, I felt comfortable with all the staff, my appointment was at 1:15 pm and DR. Jonny, was literally seeing me by that time, he was very explicit and easy to understand. I would definitely recommend him to anyone. I couldn’t have selected a better Dr. for my carpal tunnel syndrome. I honestly had a great Experience from beginning to end of my appointment.
